name: brew-and-clay
description: Brew and Clay e-commerce website with MongoDB integration

scripts.build: (if not exist dist mkdir dist) && (if not exist dist\css mkdir dist\css) && (if not exist dist\js mkdir dist\js) && xcopy index.html dist\ /Y && xcopy about.html dist\ /Y && xcopy Html dist\ /E /I /Y && xcopy Material dist\ /E /I /Y && xcopy MugImages dist\ /E /I /Y && xcopy js dist\js\ /E /I /Y && xcopy css dist\css\ /E /I /Y
